summary: Temporary fix to Spriggan Leaf bug
descriptionHtml:
This isn\'t necessarily a bug fix as much as it is a solution to an annoying problem I was having.  Somehow I randomly got the Spriggan Leaves particle effect attached to my character and couldn\'t get rid of them so I made a quick re-texture of the particles and now they\'re transparent.  The only problem is they are transparent on the Spriggans as well but if you have this glitch/bug then you know the effect being invisible on the spriggans is a minor aesthetic problem.  I also included a video to help with any questions.  Install the files to:

C/Progarm Files/Steam/SteamApps/Commom/Skyrim/Data

Or wherever you have Skyrim installed on your computer.  Hopefully this helps anyone with this problem.  Thanks.
author: dab0ne
